title: Welcome to Turkey
description: Millions of people visit Turkey each year to explore the fascinating history and spectacular art of this unique country. Welcome to Turkey introduces students to the country of Turkey and what makes it a unique place in the world. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and supporting details as well as identify and use proper nouns.
reviewWords: borders, enjoy, explore, famous, special, villages
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /i/ sound
grammar: Proper Nouns                : Recognize and use proper nouns that name places
wordWork: Boldface Words                : Identify and use boldface words
